verbose_text: BI-1 knockout mice subjected to hepatic IR injury exhibited the following characteristics : increased histological injury, increased serum transaminases, indicative of more hepatocyte death increased percentages of TUNEL positive hepatocytes, greater elevations in caspase activity, and greater activation of ER stress proteins IRE1alpha, ATF6, and XBP-1, compared to wild-type BI-1 mice [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: increased percentages of TUNEL-positive hepatocytes, greater elevations in caspase activity, and greater activation of ER stress proteins IRE1alpha, ATF6, and XBP-1
